data.name: VR Hockey Reborn
data.description:
VR Hockey Reborn was carefully created by a former hockey player. Our main goal is to create best experience for players who never tried play hockey, and to fit the requirements of all hockey players across the globe.

Experiment with physics, feel the pleasure of the realism of puck possession, score goals in different ways.

The game is also suitable for beginners in hockey. You can even play with one hand.

-The feeling of being on the hockey rink
-Attention to detail
-Realistic puck possession physics
-Tested by real hockey players

changelog.change_log:
NEW GAME MODES
Deflection training 
Goalie Screened Training ( 1-3-1 vs 1 + Triangle PK)

Dummies in playground replaced with humanoids
AI in goalie modes replaced with humanoids
One timer mode is fixed with bigger delay
No more double pass request in One timers
Real Stick setup has been added to the single player challenges
Real Stick setup in locker room has been moved to shooting area
No more die hard passes when AI in front of you
Super experimental early access controller attachment support.

Private lobbies joining should be consistent now
Hopping the boards
Closed Boards in privates (you still can go through door)
Goal horn and crowd for a second net in privates
Goalie jersey is not matches what you selected
Goalie stick should be less glitchy now

Private Lobbies!!!
Skin purchases now should be available after purchase without restart.
Visor should not be floating around anymore.
Visor should be visible to others even if you disable it in settings.

Trying to fix private lobbies
Fix goalie jersey color selection

Fully revert old puck sync
Fix IAP for different stuff

Equipment customisation system
Free skins
Mirrored Visors
Pads and Masks selection for Goalies
More stick skins

Fix disappearing bodies (hopefully) 
Added swap for movement/rotation axis
Added option to turn off the turning
Added option to mute others in VC (buggy and still work in progress)

New height calibration system
Damage in fights taken only with dropped gloves
Expandable stick
Shooting zone for locker room

Trying to fix puck hanging in the air in Lobby
Fix visual settings for golden goalie mask
Fixing purchased items not always showing in Multiplayer

Adding goal horn to MP
Adding "Crowd"
Fix of the goalie pads for single player
Support development by purchasing blacked out BRO Stick.

Fight improved
Double tap B button to drop the gloves (Forwards only)
Double tap B Button to reset them (Forwards only).
You can grab opponent by the collar.
Goalies now have names and bodies just like players.

Fights Fights Fights!!!
Body prototype added to MP!
Fixed exit from the voice chat on the lobby exit
